title: ‘I Want to Win the Tour de France Again:’ Vingegaard Racing for Redemption with Tour-Vuelta Double
content:
Vingegaard lays down some ambitious markers for 2025, with a return to the Tour and Vuelta. Nemesis Tadej Pogačar will be waiting.

Read the full article at ‘I Want to Win the Tour de France Again:’ Vingegaard Racing for Redemption with Tour-Vuelta Double on Velo.
author: ahood
